text:
[Verse]
Lights are shining from afar
Feel the rhythm in my heart
Dancing under moonlit skies
Catch my breath in your eyes

[Verse 2]
Feet are moving to the beat
City lights down the street
Twirl me 'round don't let me go
In this moment's magic glow

[Chorus]
Dance the night away
Don't care what they say
Stars guide our way
Together we'll stay

[Verse 3]
Every step a new surprise
Echoes of our laughter rise
In the night so pure and free
You and me our destiny

[Chorus]
Dance the night away
Don't care what they say
Stars guide our way
Together we'll stay

[Bridge]
Hand in hand we spin and twirl
In this magic world
Moments turning into gold
In your arms I feel bold
title: Dancing Under the Stars
